about_the_game:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Celebrate the history of US rail with this stunning mix of Fallen Flag schemes, haul freight in colorful style with the NS Heritage Livery Collection for Train Sim World®, which depicts 9 liveries carried by a fleet of Norfolk Southern’s ES44AC locomotives!

  • NS No. 8025 represents the Monongahela Railway with its all-over gray application, adorned with white stripe
  • NS No. 8099 recalls the suave, sage colors of the Southern Railway, green and pale gray combined, accented with yellow lettering
  • NS No. 8100 is buzzing with the memories of the Nickel Plate Road, midnight black and honey yellow stripes, how bold!
  • NS No. 8101 wears the stately stripes of Central Of Georgia, a corporate collage of blue and gray, complete with red eagle
  • NS No. 8102 harkens back to the famed Pennsylvania Railroad, Tuscan red and Buff yellow, it doesn’t get more iconic
  • NS No. 8103 is straight to the point with its Norfolk & Western recollection, it’s big, it’s bold, and it’s blue!
  • NS No. 8104 continues the primary color parade for the Lehigh Valley, bright red, mixed with yellow and white
  • NS No. 8105 brings back the Interstate Railroad, with an impactful and potent appearance of orange, cream and grey
  • NS No. 8114 returns to home rails, wearing the red black and yellow scheme of the original Norfolk Southern Railway

Re-live the legacy of the Norfolk Southern, use these liveries on a selection of new and engaging scenarios, and unite their power within Timetable Mode. The liveries of railroads' past come together to haul heavy freight in Train Sim World®.

Please Note: For the full experience, we recommend you own Train Sim World®: Horseshoe Curve which is available as a separate purchase.

Key Features


  • NS ES44AC diesel locomotive in 9 Heritage railroad liveries:
    • NS 8025 Monongahela Railway
    • NS 8099 Southern Railway
    • NS 8100 Nickel Plate Road
    • NS 8101 Central Of Georgia
    • NS 8102 Pennsylvania Railroad
    • NS 8103 Norfolk & Western
    • NS 8104 Lehigh Valley
    • NS 8105 Interstate Railroad
    • NS 8114 Norfolk Southern Railway (Original)
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cab
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Includes Training Module on the Training Center
  • Includes 6 Scenarios and is operable on the Timetable for Horseshoe Curve
  • Livery Designer, Scenario Planner and Creators Club compatible
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download size: 301.6 MB
detailed_description:

Celebrate the history of US rail with this stunning mix of Fallen Flag schemes, haul freight in colorful style with the NS Heritage Livery Collection for Train Sim World®, which depicts 9 liveries carried by a fleet of Norfolk Southern’s ES44AC locomotives!

  • NS No. 8100 is buzzing with the memories of the Nickel Plate Road, midnight black and honey yellow stripes, how bold!
  • NS No. 8101 wears the stately stripes of Central Of Georgia, a corporate collage of blue and gray, complete with red eagle
  • NS No. 8102 harkens back to the famed Pennsylvania Railroad, Tuscan red and Buff yellow, it doesn’t get more iconic
  • NS No. 8103 is straight to the point with its Norfolk & Western recollection, it’s big, it’s bold, and it’s blue!
  • NS No. 8104 continues the primary color parade for the Lehigh Valley, bright red, mixed with yellow and white
  • NS No. 8105 brings back the Interstate Railroad, with an impactful and potent appearance of orange, cream and grey
  • NS No. 8114 returns to home rails, wearing the red black and yellow scheme of the original Norfolk Southern Railway

Re-live the legacy of the Norfolk Southern, use these liveries on a selection of new and engaging scenarios, and unite their power within Timetable Mode. The liveries of railroads' past come together to haul heavy freight in Train Sim World®.

Please Note: For the full experience, we recommend you own Train Sim World®: Horseshoe Curve which is available as a separate purchase.

  • NS ES44AC diesel locomotive in 9 Heritage railroad liveries:

  • Livery Designer, Scenario Planner and Creators Club compatible
